title: Death Notice - Betty Vander Linden
content:
Elizabeth M. Vander Linden, 96, formerly of Leighton, IA passed away Saturday, September 5, 2015 at the Northern Mahaska Nursing & Rehab Center in Oskaloosa, IA. Funeral services will be held Wednesday, September 9, 2015 at 10:30 a.m. at the First Reformed Church in Pella. Interment will follow at the Oakwood Cemetery in Pella. 
  
Visitation will be after 1:00 p.m. Tuesday, September 8 at the Van Dyk-Duven Funeral Home. The family will greet relatives and friends prior to the service on Wednesday morning at the First Reformed Church. Memorial contributions are preferred for the Northern Mahaska Nursing & Rehab Center in Oskaloosa, IA.
